########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND fll_est_sources
    my_fll_impl.cc
)

set(fll_est_sources "${fll_est_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
set(GR_REQUIRED_COMPONENTS RUNTIME FILTER)
set(GR_REQUIRED_COMPONENTS RUNTIME FILTER FFT BLOCKS DIGITAL)
if(NOT fll_est_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT fll_est_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-fll_est SHARED ${fll_est_sources} ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${GNURADIO_ALL_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-fll_est gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime 
			gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime
			gnuradio::gnuradio-filter
			gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks
			gnuradio::gnuradio-fft
			gnuradio::gnuradio-pmt
			${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
                      	${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES} )
target_include_directories(gnuradio-fll_est
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-fll_est PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_fll_est_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-fll_est PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-fll_est)


########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_fll_est_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-fll_est)

if(NOT test_fll_est_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_fll_est_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_fll_est_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("fll_est_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
